titleStmt.title: The price of our redemption A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the sixt of Aprill last, 1617. By Charles Richardson, preacher at Saint Katherines neere the Tower of London.
titleStmt.author: Richardson, Charles, fl. 1612-1617.

titleStmt.title: The price of our redemption A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the sixt of Aprill last, 1617. By Charles Richardson, preacher at Saint Katherines neere the Tower of London.
titleStmt.author: Richardson, Charles, fl. 1612-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: By W. Iaggard, for W. Butler, and are to be solde at his shop in the Bulwarke, neere the Tower of London,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 21015a on UMI microfilm, reel 663.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 663 #8 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy), and at reel 1609 #3 (British Library copy).
